greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: 2-adic factorial function.
reference: Serge Lang, Cyclotomic Fields I and II, Springer-Verlag, 1990, p. 315.
link: Kenny Lau, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..806
formula: a(n) = (-1)^n*n!/A037223(n), A037223(n) = 2^floor(n/2)*floor(n/2)!. Exponential generating function: (1-x)*exp(x^2/2). - Antonio G. Astudillo (afg_astudillo(AT)hotmail.com), Nov 01 2002
mathematica: 4[ n_] := If[ n < 0, 0, n! SeriesCoefficient[ (1 - x) Exp[x^2/2], {x, 0, n}]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Jun 30 2018 *)
program: def Gauss_factorial(N, n): return mul(j for j in (1..N) if gcd(j, n) == 1)
(MAGMA) /* Based on Gauss factorial n_2!: */ k:=2; [IsZero(n) select 1 else (-1)^n*&*[j: j in [1..n] | IsOne(GCD(j,k))]: n in [0..30]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Dec 10 2013
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Jun 06 2000
